source: Grid from CRU-TS data, land fractions from GADM version 3.6
history: LandInG toolbox: predefined CRU-TS grid enforced on land fractions extracted from GADM level 0 polygons; post-processing: values >0.999 set to 1
descr: Land fraction in each grid cell. Includes inland water bodies. Does not include ocean fraction of cells along coastlines
